evidence.claim: The company follows HIPAA compliance guidelines for handling patient data.
Integrity Home Health Care uses EDI standards for transaction processing, including HIPAA X12 formats.
They have a dedicated section on their website discussing their commitment to secure data management within the healthcare sector.
Integration capabilities with electronic health records (EHRs) are highlighted under their services.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found indicating engagement with X12 transactions or API automation.
